articles.title: Car makers ask for time as EU ban on conventional engines moves forward
articles.description: Following European Parliament vote to advance the ban, auto makers say 2035 deadline isn’t realistic
articles.content: As Europe moves closer to approving a legal ban on the sale of new cars with internal combustion engines, auto makers are calling for more time to make the shift to electric cars.

articles.content: Intel Corp. is adjusting some near-term spending plans, joining other tech companies in reassessing priorities amid global economic uncertainty.
